{{TeyvatQuest|title=As the Sun Rises and Sets|chapter=5|act=5|part=2}}

==Steps==
# Go to the [[Speaker's Chamber]] to meet [[Mavuika]]
# Invite Mavuika to come along with you
# Go to the [["People of the Springs"|People of the Springs]]
# Chat with your friends and wait for the feast to begin
#* Have a chat with Kachina and Mualani (optional)
#* Have a chat with Kinich (optional)
#* Have a chat with Ororon (optional)
#* Have a chat with Iansan (optional)
#* Have a chat with Chasca (optional)
# Follow [[Ororon]] and take part in the ceremony
# Return and rejoin the feast
# Follow the path to escort [[Kachina]] back to [["Children of Echoes"|the tribe]]
# Continue forward along the path
# Follow [[Hanwi]]
# Talk to [[Ayo]] and his family
# Take Kachina back home
# Check on how the forging of the [[Ancient Name]] is going
# Test the Ancient Name outside the camp
# Talk to [[Vichama|the soul]] that suddenly appeared
# Talk to the souls that suddenly appeared<!-- Not a mistake or repeat -->
# Check on the [[Tepetlisaurus]]'s condition

==Gameplay Notes==
* During step 4, the available "friends" are [[Chasca]], [[Iansan]], [[Kachina]], [[Kinich]], and [[Ororon]]. The player only needs to talk to 3 of them to proceed.
* The optional NPCs [[Kinai]] and [[Caipa]] can only be interacted with during step 4.
* Completing step 11 grants the {{Achievement|Unfinished Journey}}.

==Dialogue==
{{Quest Description|The time for the meeting has finally come. Head over to the Speaker's Chamber.}}
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Enter the Speaker's Chamber)
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 xilonen 01.ogg}} '''Xilonen:''' I see. If all goes well, three days should be more than enough to forge the name. You won't need to push back the plan.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 mavuika 01.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' Thank you. I'd say the sooner you can finish it, the better. I still need to announce the matter to everyone.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 citlali 01a.ogg}} {{A|vo ntaq301 7 citlali 01b.ogg}} '''Citlali:''' Don't worry. We should only need half a day. {{Traveler}} has been in Natlan a while, now. The [[Pilgrim's Chronicle]] should have enough records of {{MC|m=his|f=her}} adventures.
:;(Traveler and Paimon knock on the door)
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 mavuika 02.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' Come in.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 paimon 01.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Hey, Mavuika! Oh, [[Xilonen]] and [[Citlali]] are here too! Hello!
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 mavuika 03.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' We were just talking about you. I invited you here for two reasons. First, there's {{Traveler}}'s Ancient Name, which is ready to be forged.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 paimon 02.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Oh, yeah! You need the Pilgrim's Chronicle, right? The device the [[Lord of the Night]] gave us.
:{{DIcon}} I brought it with me.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 xilonen 02.ogg}} '''Xilonen:''' Perfect. Could I take a look?
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 xilonen 03.ogg}} '''Xilonen:''' Hmm... Yep.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 xilonen 04.ogg}} '''Xilonen:''' Looks good. This is definitely enough to work with.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 xilonen 05.ogg}} '''Xilonen:''' Usually, the first step to forging an Ancient Name is performing a ceremony to extract memories from the [[Ley Line]]s. But, since the Lord of the Night gave us this record, we can skip that part.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 xilonen 06.ogg}} '''Xilonen:''' Still, I've never used something like this before. This is an entirely new material for me, so I need to look into how the process might change.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 citlali 02.ogg}} '''Citlali:''' I'll help you. My knowledge on the Lord of the Night and the [[Wayob]] might come in handy.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 mavuika 04.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' That brings me to the second matter. As you already know, once your Ancient Name is complete, we need to venture into the deepest part of the Night Kingdom.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 mavuika 05.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' That will happen in three days' time.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 paimon 03.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Th&mdash;Three days!? So soon?
:{{DIcon}} I'll start getting ready.
:{{DIcon}} That won't be a problem.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 paimon 04.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Wait! But, um...
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 mavuika 06.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' You're worried about {{Traveler}}, aren't you?
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 paimon 05.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Well, Paimon gave it a lot of thought, and Paimon's not very good at thinking or fighting to begin with. It's just...
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 paimon 06.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' This plan could save countless lives. Paimon understands why people would want to be a part of something so important...
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 paimon 07a.ogg}}<!--{{A|vo ntaq301 7 paimon 07b.ogg}}--> '''Paimon:''' But... all this time, Paimon has barely left {{Traveler}}'s side. Not to mention, we all know this will be a super dangerous mission...
:{{DIcon}} Just trust us.
:{{DIcon}} We have to be the ones to do this.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 mavuika 07.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' That's right. And, as long as we win, the [[Ode of Resurrection]] will return us to this land.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 mavuika 08.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' The Night Kingdom is a realm of souls and memories, where mental fortitude outweighs physical strength.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 mavuika 09.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' All in Natlan are resolved to win this war. The [[Sacred Flame]] will connect us to their fighting spirit. We will do whatever it takes to win.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 mavuika 10.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' So, if you want to contribute, just cheer us on alongside all the people of Natlan. For {{Traveler}}, I'm sure your words of encouragement are among the most important.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 paimon 08.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' The most important? Really...?
:{{DIcon}} That way, it'd be like we're still together.
::{{A|vo ntaq301 7 paimon 09a 1.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' That's right! Overcoming danger side by side, just like always!
:{{DIcon}} That way, I'll always remember how much you care about me.
::{{A|vo ntaq301 7 paimon 09b 1.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Okay... then, please don't do anything reckless! That's what Paimon's trying to avoid!
:{{DIcon}} That way, it'll be just like fishing with you cheering me on.
::{{A|vo ntaq301 7 paimon 09c 1.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Uh, not sure what fishing has to do with anything, but... If you're making weird analogies, guess that means you're not nervous.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 paimon 10.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Alright, it's decided! Paimon will cheer the loudest out of everyone in Natlan!
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 citlali 03a.ogg}}<!--{{A|vo ntaq301 7 citlali 03b.ogg}}--> '''Citlali:''' It's less about volume, and more about mental focus. But, I get it. You're just trying to show how much you care.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 mavuika 11.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' Of course, this all depends on the successful completion of the Ancient Name.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 mavuika 12a.ogg}}<!--{{A|vo ntaq301 7 mavuika 12b.ogg}}--> '''Mavuika:''' Otherwise, {{Traveler}} will not join me. That is the condition.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 xilonen 07.ogg}} '''Xilonen:''' Don't worry. I swear on the honor of my tribe &mdash; I will not fail. I know how important this is.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 citlali 04.ogg}} '''Citlali:''' There's no time to lose. Let's go.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 xilonen 08.ogg}} '''Xilonen:''' Alright, everyone. When we meet again, it will be to deliver the Ancient Name.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 paimon 11.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Good luck, you two!
:;(Xilonen and Citlali exit)
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 paimon 12.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Three days, huh... What should we do in the meantime? We know you're still rebuilding, so is there anything we can do to help?
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 mavuika 13.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' From what I've heard, the two of you have helped more than enough. You should take a well-deserved rest.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 mavuika 14.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' Even if there are stray [[Abyss]] monsters out there, our warriors can handle them. Don't worry.
:{{DIcon}} Still, if things haven't returned to normal...
:{{DIcon}} Resting isn't my style.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 paimon 13.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Exactly! We can't take a break! We're adventurers! We've gotta live up to the name!
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 paimon 14.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' We still have a long journey ahead of us and so many places to go! The battle in three days is just another part of our adventure!
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 mavuika 15.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' Haha, I see. In that case, just do what you think is best.
:{{DIcon}} What about you?
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 mavuika 16.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' This final battle is extremely important to me &mdash; the culmination of my life's work. Still, I think you've got the right idea.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 mavuika 17.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' I'm also going to follow my heart. I plan on using these three days to calm my mind and work on a painting.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 paimon 15.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Oh? You know how to paint?
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 mavuika 18.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' I just learned, actually. I hear it takes a lot of practice to get any good.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 mavuika 19.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' It could be anything, though. What I really enjoy is the process of getting better at something through practice. It's how I relax.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 mavuika 20.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' Of course, that's only when I have the time. I'm usually too busy.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 paimon 16.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' So, that's how you relax... Well, it definitely seems like your style.
:{{DIcon}} We'll leave you to it, then.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 mavuika 21.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' Alright. Let's go our separate ways for now.
:;(Mavuika exits)
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 paimon 17.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' So, if Mavuika relaxes by working really hard at something... That basically means she never takes a break, right? Wow, she's definitely something else...
:;(Someone knocks on the door)
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 paimon 18.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Oh, uh... hello? Sorry, Mavuika's not here right now.
:;([[Mualani]] and Kachina enter)
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 mualani 01.ogg}} '''Mualani:''' There you are!
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 kachina 01.ogg}} '''Kachina:''' *panting*... We made it.
:{{DIcon}} Why are you so out of breath?
:{{DIcon}} Is something wrong?
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 mualani 02.ogg}} '''Mualani:''' Haha, other than our plan almost falling through? Nothing at all!
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 mualani 03.ogg}} '''Mualani:''' The preparations took longer than expected. We were so worried we wouldn't make it before you left on your next big adventure.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 kachina 02.ogg}} '''Kachina:''' Well, if you hadn't overslept...
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 mualani 04.ogg}} '''Mualani:''' Details, details. Anyway, come on! Let's go to the People of the Springs!
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 paimon 19.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Hold on! Tell us what's going on first.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 mualani 05.ogg}} '''Mualani:''' Oh, yeah, haha. Jumped the gun a bit there, didn't I? Basically, we know about your super important mission coming up, and we want to give you a proper send-off!
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 mualani 06.ogg}} '''Mualani:''' Before the [[Pilgrimage]], we usually hold a huge feast! All you can eat, with meat by the tableful!
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 paimon 20.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Ooh! All you can eat!?
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 mualani 07.ogg}} '''Mualani:''' I knew that would pique your interest, Paimon. You can eat to your heart's content. You won't wanna miss out, I promise!
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 mualani 08.ogg}} '''Mualani:''' Of course, there's not just meat, but also all kinds of fruit, vegetables, desserts, drinks, you name it! You won't be disappointed!
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 paimon 21.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' That sounds amazing! We're in!
:{{DIcon}} Didn't you just say we need to live up to our title as adventurers?
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 paimon 22.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Well, the best adventurers know how to go with the flow, right?
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 paimon 23.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Plus, it sounds like this feast is in your honor. If you don't show up, everyone's hard work will be for nothing!
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 kachina 03.ogg}} '''Kachina:''' It's our fault for not telling you earlier, so it's okay if you can't make it. Still, if you're not busy, we'd really like you to be there. It won't take up too much of your time!
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 kachina 04.ogg}} '''Kachina:''' It'll be super fun! Plus, all our friends will be there.
:{{DIcon}} Okay!
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 paimon 24.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' YES! Let's go eat!
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 paimon 25.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Huh? What's the hold up, {{Traveler}}? Did you think of something?
:{{DIcon}} Why don't we invite Mavuika?
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 together 01.ogg}} '''Paimon & Kachina & Mualani:''' Huh!?
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 paimon 26.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' I&mdash;Isn't she painting?
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 kachina 05.ogg}} '''Kachina:''' Is that okay? It's not like we prepared anything fancy...
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 mualani 09.ogg}} '''Mualani:''' W&mdash;Well, I definitely wasn't expecting that suggestion. She's the [[Archon]], after all. Maybe it's not our place...
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 mualani 10.ogg}} '''Mualani:''' But, we might as well extend the invitation! The Archon is about to fight for us with everything she has! This feast is in her honor, too!
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 kachina 06.ogg}} '''Kachina:''' Um, then who's gonna be the one to invite her?
:{{A|vo ntaq301 7 mualani 11.ogg}} '''Mualani:''' All of us, of course!

;(Knock on Mavuika's door)
:{{A|vo ntaq301 8 mavuika 01.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' Come in.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 8 mavuika 02.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' Oh, it's you four. Is there something you need?
:{{A|vo ntaq301 8 paimon 01.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' We're here to invite you to the People of the Springs for a feast!
:{{A|vo ntaq301 8 mavuika 03.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' Ah, I see. This is a special kind of feast, isn't it?
:{{A|vo ntaq301 8 mualani 01.ogg}} '''Mualani:''' Exactly! It's a tradition to hold a feast before battle! We couldn't miss out on this opportunity. It's our way of cheering you on!
:{{A|vo ntaq301 8 kachina 01.ogg}} '''Kachina:''' Plus, I always wanted to do something to thank you for saving me from the [[Night Kingdom]]...
:{{A|vo ntaq301 8 mavuika 04.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' That was my duty. Besides, it's all in the past now. You don't owe me anything.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 8 mavuika 05.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' Although, this feast does sound rather interesting.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 8 mualani 02.ogg}} '''Mualani:''' So, you'll come?
:{{A|vo ntaq301 8 mavuika 06.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' Of course. No need to notify [[Amina]] in advance. I'll just surprise her, haha.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 8 mavuika 07.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' You don't need to turn this into some kind of grand banquet on my account.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 8 mavuika 08.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' I'll try my best to attend as an ordinary person, not an Archon.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 8 paimon 02.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' It's not like you're the type to pull rank or something.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 8 mavuika 09.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' True, but my presence changes the way people act. I just don't want to spoil the fun &mdash; a lot of things can change once an Archon is involved.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 8 mavuika 10.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' Barbecue is best fresh off the grill. And still, people will insist on waiting for me to eat first.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 8 paimon 03.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Oh, yeah... Paimon can see that...
:{{A|vo ntaq301 8 mualani 03.ogg}} '''Mualani:''' Don't worry, I'll jump in if that happens! I can throw manners to the wind, no problem!
:{{A|vo ntaq301 8 mavuika 11.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' No need, I can take care of it. Anyway, thank you for inviting me. It really means a lot.
:{{DIcon}} What about your painting?
:{{A|vo ntaq301 8 mavuika 12.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' I don't need to finish it. I enjoy the process, but now there's something more interesting to do.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 8 kachina 02.ogg}} '''Kachina:''' Th&mdash;Then, let's go together! The main dish should be ready soon!
{{Dialogue End}}

{{Quest Description|update|Citlali and Xilonen are preparing to craft a brand-new Ancient Name for you. While you wait, Mualani and Kachina invite you to a feast hosted by the People of the Springs, to which Mavuika will accompany you also.}}
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Approach Amina and [[Kinich]])
:{{A|vo ntaq301 9 kinich 01.ogg}} '''Kinich:''' Amina, there's been another delivery.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 9 amina 01.ogg}} '''Amina:''' You're kidding! ANOTHER one?
:{{A|vo ntaq301 9 kinich 02.ogg}} '''Kinich:''' Just like the others &mdash; they heard about the feast and wanted to send something to contribute.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 9 amina 02.ogg}} '''Amina:''' But, this is just a small send-off. What are we going to do with all this stuff?
:{{A|vo ntaq301 9 amina 03.ogg}} '''Amina:''' Then again, I understand where they're coming from... I'll deal with it. *sigh* What a headache... If this continues, half of this stuff's gonna go bad before we get to it...
:;(Traveler, Paimon, Mualani and Kachina arrive with Mavuika in tow)
:{{A|vo ntaq301 9 amina 04.ogg}} '''Amina:''' HUH!? You... you're here already!? And you've even brought the...
:{{A|vo ntaq301 9 amina 05.ogg}} '''Amina:''' A&mdash;Archon!? What are you doing here?
:{{A|vo ntaq301 9 mualani 01.ogg}} '''Mualani:''' We invited her! She agreed to come as a surprise guest!
:{{A|vo ntaq301 9 amina 06.ogg}} '''Amina:''' Surprise is putting it lightly... Sorry, sorry. I'm happy you're here, it's just...
:{{A|vo ntaq301 9 mavuika 01.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' No apology necessary. What's going on?
:{{A|vo ntaq301 9 amina 07.ogg}} '''Amina:''' Well, I started spreading the word about the send-off, just around the area, like usual. A lot of people are still busy repairing their homes, so I didn't think many people would come.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 9 amina 08.ogg}} '''Amina:''' But, the turnout has been overwhelming. Not to mention, we've received a small mountain of deliveries. There's no way we can use all this stuff.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 9 mualani 02.ogg}} '''Mualani:''' That's our Star Outlander's popularity for you!
:{{DIcon}} So, you remember that nickname...
:{{A|vo ntaq301 9 paimon 01.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' You're saying... everyone's here because of us?
:{{A|vo ntaq301 9 amina 09.ogg}} '''Amina:''' Yep! The news about your impending mission with the Pyro Archon has spread all over Natlan.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 9 amina 10.ogg}} '''Amina:''' Plus, you were amazing in the recent battle. A lot of people are here just to thank you, or wish you good luck.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 9 amina 11.ogg}} '''Amina:''' Basically, this whole thing is happening because so many people wanted to see you.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 9 kinich 03.ogg}} '''Kinich:''' Still, we definitely weren't expecting you to show up with the Pyro Archon.
:{{DIcon}} It was my idea.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 9 paimon 02a.ogg}}<!--{{A|vo ntaq301 9 paimon 02b.ogg}}--> '''Paimon:''' Yeah! Mavuika and {{Traveler}} are in this together! They both deserve a celebration.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 9 amina 12.ogg}} '''Amina:''' Well, this is the perfect excuse to throw an even bigger party! All this extra stuff was gonna go to waste, anyway...
:{{A|vo ntaq301 9 mavuika 02.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' No need to go to all that trouble on my account. That's not why I'm here.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 9 mavuika 03.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' Besides, with so much of our nation in ruins, resources are still scarce. Extra spending for my sake is the last thing we need.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 9 amina 13.ogg}} '''Amina:''' That's true...
:{{A|vo ntaq301 9 amina 14.ogg}} '''Amina:''' *sigh* Party-planning isn't easy. I can handle the big picture, but I'm not used to dealing with the finer details. That was always Auntie [[Atea]]'s job...
:{{A|vo ntaq301 9 amina 15.ogg}} '''Amina:''' Sorry, I'm just feeling a bit in over my head.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 9 paimon 03.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Oh, speaking of Atea, how is she? Is she feeling any better?
:;(Everyone goes silent)
:{{A|vo ntaq301 9 kachina 01.ogg}} '''Kachina:''' ...
:{{A|vo ntaq301 9 mualani 03.ogg}} '''Mualani:''' Actually, there's something we haven't told you...
:{{A|vo ntaq301 9 mualani 04.ogg}} '''Mualani:''' Auntie Atea passed away not long after the attack on our tribe.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 9 paimon 04.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' ...What?
:{{A|vo ntaq301 9 mavuika 04.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' When you brought me her talisman, I knew her end was near. Luckily, I got the chance to see her one last time.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 9 mavuika 05.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' She was a hero to the very end. Even though her body was at its breaking point, she showed no pain or sorrow.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 9 mavuika 06.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' In her final moments, her thoughts were entirely with her tribe and her people.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 9 mavuika 07.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' Gatherings like this remind me of her and the parties she loved to organize. So, I decided to attend in her memory.
:{{DIcon}} So, you already knew...
:{{A|vo ntaq301 9 kachina 02.ogg}} '''Kachina:''' We didn't mean to hide anything from you. It's just... there was never a good time to bring it up.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 9 mualani 05.ogg}} '''Mualani:''' Cheer up, everyone! Auntie Atea wouldn't want us to remember her with tears!
:{{A|vo ntaq301 9 mualani 06.ogg}} '''Mualani:''' Parties like this were her specialty, but now it's up to us to carry on her legacy! So, we can't let her down &mdash; believe me, she has high standards!
:{{A|vo ntaq301 9 paimon 05.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Yeah, that sounds about right...
:{{A|vo ntaq301 9 mualani 07.ogg}} '''Mualani:''' So, come on, let's get to work, everyone! Oh, uh... Chief Amina and our guests of honor excluded! Kachina, Kinich, time to go!
:;(Mualani drags Kachina away)
:{{A|vo ntaq301 9 kachina 03.ogg}} '''Kachina:''' Wait, you don't have drag me...
:{{A|vo ntaq301 9 mavuika 08.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' Amina, you mentioned something about a surplus of supplies. I may have a solution...
:{{A|vo ntaq301 9 mavuika 09.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' First, invite anyone who comes to deliver supplies to stay for the gathering.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 9 mavuika 10.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' If it's a caravan, ask them to extend an invitation to the sender, as well.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 9 mavuika 11.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' Make it clear in the invitation that anyone is welcome to attend, but you're no longer accepting donations.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 9 mavuika 12.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' In addition, all leftover supplies will be purchased by the Speaker's Chamber, sorted, and donated to the appropriate areas.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 9 amina 16.ogg}} '''Amina:''' Th&mdash;That would be such a big help, Archon! Thank you!
:{{A|vo ntaq301 9 amina 17.ogg}} '''Amina:''' I'll get on it, right away!
:{{A|vo ntaq301 9 paimon 06.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Amazing plan, Mavuika! It was clear, concise, and organized... But, uh, weren't you trying to keep this small?
:{{A|vo ntaq301 9 mavuika 13.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' I don't mind increasing the size of the gathering, I just didn't want it to be because of me.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 9 mavuika 14.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' My approach to problem-solving is always the same. Different solutions lead to different outcomes. The method may change, but the "right choice" is always grounded in logic and reason.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 9 paimon 07.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Whoa, Paimon feels like she just learned a thing or two!
:{{A|vo ntaq301 9 paimon 08.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Well, should we take a walk while everyone finishes the preparations?
:{{DIcon}} I mean, we are the guests of honor.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 9 mavuika 15.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' Sounds good. A casual stroll can be hard to come by. Let's go.

;(Talk to [[Kinai]], optional)
:{{A|vo ntaq301 15 kinai 01.ogg}} '''Kinai:''' If we don't solve the crisis in the Night Kingdom, war will continue to ravage our nation.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 15 kinai 02.ogg}} '''Kinai:''' We've achieved a brief moment of peace, but we can't get complacent. Even if it's not on the front lines, there are still things we can do.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 15 kinai 03.ogg}} '''Kinai:''' Like fortifying our defenses, eliminating remaining monsters, rebuilding our homes...
:{{A|vo ntaq301 15 kinai 04.ogg}} '''Kinai:''' And coming together like this to sing for you and offer our warmest blessings.

;(Talk to [[Caipa]], optional)
:{{A|vo ntaq301 16 caipa 01.ogg}} '''Caipa:''' Archon, what is it like in the depths of the Night Kingdom? We really can't go with you?
:{{A|vo ntaq301 16 mavuika 01.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' No, that region has been completely corroded by the Abyss. Without protection, an ordinary person would not last a minute.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 16 caipa 02.ogg}} '''Caipa:''' Oh... I guess we'd only get in your way... Then, this really is a battle reserved for the gods.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 16 mavuika 02.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' Fear not &mdash; I've been preparing for this moment a long time.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 16 mavuika 03.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' This duty is mine to bear, and I will succeed.

;(Approach Kachina at [[Golden Dusk]])
:{{A|vo ntaq301 10 kachina 01.ogg}} '''Kachina:''' Mualani, it's almost time for the feast!
:{{A|vo ntaq301 10 kachina 02.ogg}} '''Kachina:''' Maybe we should send the drinks out first? There's a bunch of guests here already.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 10 mualani 01.ogg}} '''Mualani:''' Yep, yep! I'm making the juice as we speak... Oh, right! The ice!
:;(Kachina paces back before being startled)
:{{A|vo ntaq301 10 kachina 03.ogg}} '''Kachina:''' Huh!? Oh, you scared me! Sorry, we're a little busy in the kitchen right now, but the food is almost ready!
:{{A|vo ntaq301 10 mualani 02.ogg}} '''Mualani:''' AJAW! Get out of the ice bucket!
:{{A|vo ntaq301 10 ajaw 01.ogg}} '''Ajaw:''' The Almighty Dragonlord [[K'uhul Ajaw]] will not tolerate this stifling hut! We seek a cool place of repose. This bucket suits our taste.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 10 mualani 03.ogg}} '''Mualani:''' Great, now we can't use any of this ice. HEY! This is your mess! Get back here!
:{{A|vo ntaq301 10 mualani 04.ogg}} '''Mualani:''' Kachina, Ajaw is on the run. Help me catch him!
:{{A|vo ntaq301 10 kachina 04.ogg}} '''Kachina:''' O&mdash;Okay...! Sorry, I gotta help with Ajaw.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 10 paimon 01.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' As usual, Ajaw brings chaos wherever he goes.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 10 mavuika 01.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' Lively, isn't it?
:{{A|vo ntaq301 10 mavuika 02.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' Leave this to me, Kachina.
:;(Mavuika captures Ajaw)
:{{A|vo ntaq301 10 ajaw 02.ogg}} '''Ajaw:''' What is this? Who dares lay a hand on the Almighty... Tch, Mavuika.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 10 mavuika 03.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' I got him, Mualani.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 10 mualani 05.ogg}} '''Mualani:''' Expert Ajaw-wrangling, Archon! Thank you!
:{{A|vo ntaq301 10 ajaw 03.ogg}} '''Ajaw:''' You shall utter our name with more reverence! Or we shall... or I'll get Kinich to... ask you to apologize.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 10 paimon 02.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Some dragonlord you are, if you need your "servant" to protect you...
:{{A|vo ntaq301 10 mualani 06.ogg}} '''Mualani:''' Ajaw ruined an entire bucket of ice. We have others, but still... That was not cool! How should he be punished, Archon?
:{{A|vo ntaq301 10 mavuika 04.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' Let me think...
:{{A|vo ntaq301 10 mavuika 05.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' Seems like you could use some extra hands around here. Ajaw, help out in the kitchen.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 10 ajaw 04.ogg}} '''Ajaw:''' What? The Almighty Dragonlord K'uhul Ajaw shall not be reduced to a menial kitchen laborer...
:{{A|vo ntaq301 10 mavuika 06.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' I wasn't asking.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 10 ajaw 05.ogg}} '''Ajaw:''' ...Understood.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 10 kachina 05.ogg}} '''Kachina:''' Ajaw, you have to learn to be good at some point.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 10 mualani 07.ogg}} '''Mualani:''' Well? Hop to it! There's a pile of vegetables with your name on it! You need to wash every leaf!
:{{A|vo ntaq301 10 ajaw 06.ogg}} '''Ajaw:''' H&mdash;Help! Someone save meeeeee!
<!-- Kachina despawns after, so talking again isn't an option -->

;(Talk to Kinich)
:{{A|vo ntaq301 11 kinich 01.ogg}} '''Kinich:''' Hm, this box is missing a label... Oh, it's you. What's up?
:{{A|vo ntaq301 11 paimon 01.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Nothing! We're just taking a look around!
:{{DIcon}} What have you been up to?
:{{A|vo ntaq301 11 kinich 02.ogg}} '''Kinich:''' Well, everyone's busy rebuilding the tribes, so there's not a lot of saurian hunting work out there.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 11 kinich 03.ogg}} '''Kinich:''' But, the Pyro Archon assigned me a special mission.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 11 paimon 02.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Oh, really?
:{{A|vo ntaq301 11 mavuika 01.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' That's a bit of an exaggeration &mdash; I just asked Kinich to help identify some of the unknown casualties from the battle.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 11 mavuika 02.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' The fighting consumed all of Natlan. Countless humans and [[saurian]]s were dragged into the conflict. So, a lot of investigative work is required to confirm their identities.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 11 kinich 04.ogg}} '''Kinich:''' Just like a detective, I only have tiny details to work with. The goal is to deduce their habits and find evidence to corroborate their identity.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 11 kinich 05.ogg}} '''Kinich:''' It's tricky work, but we have every reason to keep going.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 11 paimon 03.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Because Natlan's heroes deserve to be remembered... right?
:{{A|vo ntaq301 11 mavuika 03.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' Exactly. That is how we, as the living, respect our heroes and the value of their lives.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 11 mavuika 04.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' So, let me know if you need extra help, Kinich.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 11 kinich 06.ogg}} '''Kinich:''' I'm doing fine for now. The teams searching for the fallen need the help more than me. The longer we take to find the dead, the harder it will be to piece things together.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 11 mavuika 05.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' Understood. Thank you for your hard work.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 11 kinich 07.ogg}} '''Kinich:''' Just doing my part.

;(Talk to Kinich again, optional)
:{{A|vo dialog ntaq301 kinich 01.ogg}} '''Kinich:''' Huh, still no label... If I want to know who sent this, guess the box will be my only clue.

;(Talk to [[Chasca]])
:{{A|vo ntaq301 12 mavuika 01.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' Chasca.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 12 chasca 01.ogg}} '''Chasca:''' Hello, Archon. I'm fishing.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 12 paimon 01.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Oh... Doesn't look like the fish are biting today.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 12 chasca 02.ogg}} '''Chasca:''' Yeah.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 12 chasca 03.ogg}} '''Chasca:''' ...
:;(An awkward silence fills the air)
:{{A|vo ntaq301 12 paimon 02.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Um...
:{{A|vo ntaq301 12 chasca 04.ogg}} '''Chasca:''' It's okay, you don't have to walk on eggshells around me. I know you can tell I'm not really trying to fish. But, gazing at the water puts me at ease...
:{{A|vo ntaq301 12 mavuika 02.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' I went to visit your parents, Chasca. Of course, I could only offer a few simple condolences...
:{{A|vo ntaq301 12 chasca 05.ogg}} '''Chasca:''' You helped a lot, actually. My mom has been doing much better since your visit.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 12 chasca 06.ogg}} '''Chasca:''' I've always been grateful to my parents for taking me in, but now I have an even deeper sense of responsibility.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 12 chasca 07.ogg}} '''Chasca:''' I'll never be able to replace [[Chuychu]], but I will do everything in my power to pull them out of their loneliness and despair.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 12 mavuika 03.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' That's exactly what your mother is worried about. She doesn't want you to push yourself to make up for their loss. After all, it's your loss, too.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 12 mavuika 04.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' Grief is not something that can be measured against others. You don't need to make amends, Chasca. Your loss is a tragedy, not a debt.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 12 mavuika 05.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' In any case, they've always loved both of you. There's no need for you to become Chuychu when they love you just for yourself.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 12 chasca 08.ogg}} '''Chasca:''' ...
:{{A|vo ntaq301 12 paimon 03.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Yeah! Don't put too much pressure on yourself!
:{{A|vo ntaq301 12 chasca 09.ogg}} '''Chasca:''' Thank you, everyone.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 12 chasca 10.ogg}} '''Chasca:''' Sounds like I owe my parents a conversation.

;(Talk to Chasca again, optional)
:{{A|vo dailog ntaq301 chasca 1.ogg}} '''Chasca:''' Thank you for everything you said. I'll talk to my parents soon.

;(Talk to [[Iansan]] or [[Huaccue]])<!-- Iansan's name doesn't show above her head but she is an interaction option -->
:{{A|vo ntaq301 13 iansan 01.ogg}} '''Iansan:''' Hello, you guys! Sorry for the wait. We're still setting up the venue.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 13 iansan 02.ogg}} '''Iansan:''' Hey, did I say you could take a break!? Keep pushing! This is the home stretch, and then we get to feast!
:{{A|vo ntaq301 13 huaccue 01.ogg}} '''Huaccue:''' Yes, Coach!
:{{A|vo ntaq301 13 paimon 01.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Are you still helping rebuild the tribes?
:{{A|vo ntaq301 13 iansan 03.ogg}} '''Iansan:''' That work is pretty much done, but I've discovered a lot more people with [[Abyssal Corrosion Syndrome]] in the process.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 13 iansan 04.ogg}} '''Iansan:''' So, I've been compiling patient records while helping them overcome the hallucinations. Thanks to [[The Captain]], we have the [[Draught of Lucidity]] for the worst cases.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 13 mavuika 01.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' I heard about your efforts. The Speaker's Chamber can take it from here.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 13 mavuika 02.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' It's more effective to have a focused task force, and the Speaker's Chamber can contact the [[Fatui]] directly for more doses.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 13 iansan 05.ogg}} '''Iansan:''' The doctors at the [[Stadium of the Sacred Flame|Stadium]] aren't too busy?
:{{A|vo ntaq301 13 mavuika 03.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' The worst is over, so it should be fine. I'll confirm it myself later.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 13 mavuika 04.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' I'll be in touch with next steps. I just need you to compile all existing patient records to ease the transition.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 13 iansan 06.ogg}} '''Iansan:''' Understood, Archon! Although, I'd like to continue helping out with the treatment. I can't let everything I've learned go to waste.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 13 paimon 02.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Wow, that's so responsible of you!
:{{A|vo ntaq301 13 iansan 07.ogg}} '''Iansan:''' Well, haha... Knowledge is power, after all.

;(Talk to Iansan again, optional)
:{{A|vo dialog ntaq301 iansan 01.ogg}} '''Iansan:''' Alright, break time! Get some water, and let me know if you start to feel dizzy.
:{{A|vo dialog ntaq301 iansan 02.ogg}} '''Iansan:''' I'll take things from here.

;(Talk to [[Ororon]])
:{{A|vo ntaq301 14 olorun 01a.ogg}} {{A|vo ntaq301 14 olorun 01b.ogg}} '''Ororon:''' Oh, {{MC|m=Gramps|f=other Granny}}, Archon... I swear, I've been on my best behavior recently.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 14 paimon 01.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' *sigh* Paimon knows it's just how you talk, but you've gotta realize how suspicious that sounds, right?
:{{A|vo ntaq301 14 mavuika 01.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' Haha, I am curious, though... Are you still working with [[The Captain]]?
:{{A|vo ntaq301 14 olorun 02.ogg}} '''Ororon:''' No, I don't have a reason to follow him anymore, so my life is back to normal &mdash; growing vegetables, raising [[Phlogiston Aphid|aphids]]...
:{{A|vo ntaq301 14 olorun 03.ogg}} '''Ororon:''' Well, maybe not completely normal. I'm still keeping tabs on the situation in the Night Kingdom... The Ley Lines are in a bad state.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 14 mavuika 02.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' We plan on bringing that to an end.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 14 olorun 04a.ogg}} {{A|vo ntaq301 14 olorun 04b.ogg}} '''Ororon:''' I know. You... and {{MC|m=Gramps|f=other Granny}}, right?
:{{A|vo ntaq301 14 olorun 05.ogg}} '''Ororon:''' You're going to become great heroes, and the most I can do is... weave a scroll of your deeds.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 14 paimon 02.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Oh, you know how to do that?
:{{A|vo ntaq301 14 olorun 06.ogg}} '''Ororon:''' Most people from my tribe know the art, but I'm not very good... I can never seem to empty my mind.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 14 olorun 07.ogg}} '''Ororon:''' We commemorate the deeds of others as a form of inspiration. But, rather than waiting for someone else to be inspired, isn't it faster to just take things into your own hands?
:{{A|vo ntaq301 14 paimon 03.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Well... There are always things we can't do on our own.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 14 mavuika 03.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' I wouldn't phrase it quite like that, but Paimon's not wrong.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 14 mavuika 04.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' Time will give you an answer. I know how you feel, Ororon. It took me a long time to find my place in the world.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 14 mavuika 05.ogg}} '''Mavuika:''' I'm more mature now, but that passion, that drive to prove myself... I miss it sometimes. Maybe you'll change in the future, but you can still be proud of who you are now.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 14 olorun 08.ogg}} '''Ororon:''' You're saying... I need to live in the present?
:{{DIcon}} Just do what you think is right.
:{{A|vo ntaq301 14 olorun 09.ogg}} '''Ororon:''' Hm... Thank you, Archon. That's what I've always tried to do.

;(Talk to Ororon again, optional)
:{{A|vo dialog ntaq301 olorun 01.ogg}} '''Ororon:''' The Pyro Archon is right. I still have a long way to go, but I will have time to grow.

;(If three interactions have been completed)
:{{A|vo ntaq301 16 paimon 01.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Hey, looks like the food is almost ready! Let's head over! Paimon can't wait to feast!
:{{A|vo ntaq301 16 paimon 02.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Oh, but if there are still people you want to see, that's okay... We can head over later, too...
